articles.title: MFDs are now entitled to get trail commission if investors transfer assets - Cafemutual
articles.description: So far, AMCs do not pay trail commission if an investor transfers his assets to the new distributor.
articles.content:
AMFI has issued best practices guidelines in which it has allowed AMCs to pay trail commission to MFDs if a client transfers his assets from one MFD to another.
